name: Global Screening Examiners (Pvt.) LTD
overview:
Global Screening Examiners is a leading company to provide comprehensive and affordable pre-employment background screening solutions more than 180 countries Asia Pacific, Africa & Middle East, South America and Europe and territories to protect workplace and make hiring decisions perfect.

We offer on-demand background screening services to maintain workplace compliance more effectively. Global Screening Examiners implement professional risk assessment tools to reduce potential bad hiring cost. Our professional best practice employment background screening approach provides accurate and real time background checks information with 100 professional local body researchers to reduce 60% outsourcing cost of our valued customers.

Global Screening Examiners provide fast and accurate international background screening checks, public record searches, Criminal (Felony & Misdemeanor) Records, Civil Records, Financial/Credit History, Education Verifications, Driving License Records, Employment Verifications, Professional Reference Check, and Professional License Verifications including Corporate Integrity and Enhance KYC Due Diligence solutions.

Our industry focused solutions helps Small, Medium, Large and Enterprises businesses to reduce background checks complexity and keep enhance workplace compliance through best practice employment screening program.

We use professional employment background screening process technology to manage your order and customise packages, real time reporting and invoicing status. For more information please visit www.globalscreenings.com or contact 24/H/7day a week at info@globalscreenings.com
